# How can I control API output?

**Learning objectives:**

-   Describe the expected return from an endpoint.
-   Return text from an endpoint.
-   Return an image from an endpoint.
-   Return larger data from an endpoint.
-   Return something else from an endpoint.
-   Handle API errors.
-   Set unencrypted cookies.
-   Set encrypted cookies.
